name: 沈耀明
objective: 資料表示法：定點系統(Fixed Point System)，浮點系統(Floating Point System)，2.運算工作：定點之加減乘除，快速之運算，浮點運算，3.指令與控制：各種指令介紹，中斷，硬體控制單元設計(Hardwired Control)，微程式控制單元設計(Microprogramming)，4.記憶系統：記憶體之層次 (Memory Hierarchy)，虛擬記憶系統 (Virtual memory)，快速記憶 (Cache Memory)。
schedule:
W	Date	Subjects
1	2/19	Course Introduction
2	2/26	Ch1. Introduction to Computer Organization
3	3/5	Ch2. Data Representation in Computer Systems
4	3/12	Ch2a. Data Representation in Computer Systems
5	3/19	Ch2b. Focus on Codes for Data Recording and Transmission
6	3/26	Ch3. Boolean Algebra and Digital Logic
7	4/2	本校運動會補假日
8	4/9	Ch3a. Boolean Algebra and Digital Logic
9	4/16	Midterm Test期中考
10	4/23	Ch4. An Introduction to a Simple Computer
11	4/30	Ch4a An Introduction to a Simple Computer
12	5/7	Ch5. A Closer Look at Instruction Set Architectures
13	5/14	Ch5a. A Closer Look at Instruction Set Architectures
14	5/21	Ch5b. A Closer Look at Instruction Set Architectures
15	5/28	Ch6. Memory
16	6/4	Ch6a. Memory
17	6/11	Ch6b. Memory
18	6/18	Final Test 期末考
scorePolicy:
評分標準:
1.	期中考佔35%
2.	期末考佔45%
3.	作業佔10%, 每次佔5%, 遲交一天扣0.5%.
4.	課堂表現佔10%, 每缺席一次扣1%, 遲到早退扣0.5%, 缺席達3次者本項分數為0%. 表現優異者隨時加分, 最多本項加到10%, 表現不好者隨時扣分, 最多本項扣到0%.
5.	最後再依比率調整, 以符合學校規定的最高平均分數上限.
materials:
本學期使用的課本:
書名: The Essentials of Computer Organization and Architecture 2/e
作者: Linda Null and Julia Lobur
代理商: 東華書局
連絡人: 儲方
